.

Welcome onto the forums!

Where am link for new player...where am link for new player...can't find it. Darn.

Someone will post it below, I guarantee it.

Welcome! Once you make orbit, you are well on your way.

As far as resources for beginners, I would recommend you look around in the [Tutorials Forum](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/54-Tutorials).

There is also [The Wiki](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Main_Page) which has a wealth of information.

If you have a specific question, go ahead and ask it in [The Gameplay Questions](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/15-Gameplay-Questions-and-Tutorials) section of the forums.

Hope this helps.

Happy landings!

>
